title: OSD Citizen Science Observation Input Form  (v0.1)
description: Please fill as many data as you have :).

choice.description: Is parameter measured, to be measured (in future), not to be measured, or not determined if it will be measured?

institute.title: Institute
institute.description: Please use the full, official name of your institute in English (preferably the one used for site registration).

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Please choose an SI conforming unit of measurement.

date_taken.title: Date
date_taken.description: Please note down the date on which you took your sample.

time_taken.title: Time
time_taken.description: Please note down your local time of the moment you took your sample.

latitude.description: Please note down the latitude of the place you took your sample. E.g. -10 for south or +10 for north. It is in decimal degrees as usually reported by GPS devices negative latitude for south, positive latitude for north.
latitude.title: Latitude

longitude.description: Please note down the longitude of the place you took your sample. E.g. -20 for west or +20 for east. It is in decimal degrees as usually reported by GPS devices negative longitude for west, positive longitude for east.
longitude.title: Longitude

gps_accuracy.title: GPS Accuracy
gps_accuracy.description: A radius in meter expressing how precise your latitude/longitude values are. Usually provided by GPS devices.

depth.title: Sampling Depth
depth.description: The distance below the surface of the water at which a measurement was made or a sample was collected.

weather_condition.title: Weather condition
weather_condition.description: Desribe with keywords the current weather condition

air_temperature.title: Air Temperature
air_temperature.description: Temperature of the air  in degress Celsius

water_temperature.title: Water temperature
water_temperature.description: Temperature of water in degress Celsius

salinity.description: Salinity of water at the time of taking the sample in PSU.
salinity.title: Salinity

phosphate.description: Phosphate concentration parameters in the water column
phosphate.title: Phosphate

nitrate.description: Nitrate concentration parameters in the water column
nitrate.title: Nitrate

nitrite.description: Nitrite concentration parameters in the water column
nitrite.title: Nitrite

ph.description: Alkalinity, acidity and pH of the water column
ph.title: pH

biome.description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample.
biome.title: Biome

secchi_depth.description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample.
secchi_depth.title: Secchi depth
